formattedAddress: 518 E 20th St, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 518 E 20th St, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Chen recently became my PCP and I am glad about that.  He is takes the time to really listen and he is understanding, patient, and caring.  The entire set up at Mount Sinai in Stuy Town is great.  The office is modern and clean and it is easy to make in-person and remote appointments.  I had some issues with the amount of my copay and the reception staff were less than helpful when I called in about it and gave the run around.  Apart from that, my experience has been very positive and I highly recommend Dr. Chen.

originalText.text:
Dr. Chen became recently my boys PCP
and he’s amazing. Finding the right PCP for teenagers can be challenging and my boys are very happy having him as their Dr.

originalText.text:
Dr. Chen is a wonderful doctor. Extremely professional, polite, detail-oriented and meticulous. It's evident he cares about your health as a patient.
Great appointments and I always learn something new.

Great appointments and I always learn something new.

originalText.text: When I returned to NYC, I chose Dr. Chen to be my Primary care Physician. It was a GREAT choice. Dr. Chen, his assistant Santiago, and the entire office are very kind and caring. Dr. Chen has wonderful listening skills and great insight into my care.

originalText.text:
Dr. Chen is a solid doc. Helpful and pleasant.
I'd recommend him to any friend of mine.
